DataListSpec.Name: Sponsorship Extension Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Displays all rows for given child from sponsorship extension table.
DataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION(@CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier) as set nocount on;
select dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION.ID , dbo.USR_INITIALOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE.[DESCRIPTION] as INITIALSTATUS , USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE.[DESCRIPTION] as CURRENTSTATUS , ISCURRENT , ISACCOUNTCORRECTION , dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION.DATEADDED as ADDEDDATE , dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION.DATECHANGED as CHANGEDDATE , CONVERSIONDATE , DAYSTOCONVERT , ADDEDBY.USERNAME as ADDEDBYNAME , CHANGEDBY.USERNAME as CHANGEDBYNAME from dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION left join dbo.USR_INITIALOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE ON dbo.USR_INITIALOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE.ID = dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION.INITIALOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID left join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE ON dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE.ID = dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID left join dbo.CHANGEAGENT ADDEDBY ON ADDEDBY.ID = dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION.ADDEDBYID left join dbo.CHANGEAGENT CHANGEDBY ON CHANGEDBY.ID = dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION.CHANGEDBYID where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = @CONTEXTID
